context.p: MOTODEV Studio allows you to collect Eclipse and MOTODEV Studio log files and package them into a single ZIP archive.

step.cmd: Select Collect Log Files from the MOTODEVHelp menu.
step.stepresult: The Collect Log Files dialog appears.

step.cmd: Using the Directory field, specify the directory into which the archive containing the log files should be written.
step.info: By default, the log file is written to your home directory.

step.cmd: In the File Name field, enter the name to be used for the archive file.
Using the Output file field, specify the path and filename for the archive file. Because this is a ZIP archive, you may want to give the filename a .zip extension.
Select the log files that should be archived from those listed under Log Files.
